title: Hanging, 19th century
medium:
Medium: wool, silk, cotton
Technique: pieces of fulled plain weave sewn together using stem stitches to form foundation; stem stitches attach a plied cord on the front; chain stitch for design done with a hook; borders embroidered as one continuous strip
dimensions: H x W: 244 x 160 cm (8 ft. 1/16 in. x 5 ft. 3 in.)
description: Vertical rectangular hanging embroidered to illustrate events in a heroic legend – possibly that of Rustam the Slayer of a Dragon – in a multicolored central panel on a red background. Curving vine floral borders on four sides on a black background. Wide outer border with isolated plant forms growing out from the center on a red background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Hanging, 19th century.Medium: wool, silk, cotton
Technique: pieces of fulled plain weave sewn together using stem stitches to form foundation; stem stitches attach a plied cord on the front; chain stitch for design done with a hook; borders embroidered as one continuous strip . 1977-80-1.
